titleStmt.title: By the Queene. The Queenes Maiestie vnderstandyng that certayne malicious persons haue of late tyme caused a report to be made in forren partes, that a great part of such armour and prouisions of warre as by her Maiestie hath of late yeres ben made in Germany for her owne vse, should be transported into the countries of Russia ...
Proclamations. 1561-07-08
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)

publicationStmt.publisher: In Powles Churhcyarde, by Richard Iugge, and Iohn Cawood, Printers to the Queenes Maistie,

notesStmt.note: A proclamation forbidding export of armour to Russia.
At foot of page: Cum priuilegio Regiæ Maiestatis.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
